name: Power The World!
description:
You are tasked with creating the most efficient power system! but you will face challenges in your quest! You must manage and deal with pesky emissions while building up your power system.

Can you power the world? Why not try it out!

Controls:

WASD - Movement.

Left Click - Places blocks.

Right Click - Removes blocks & clears held block.

B - Opens and closes build menu.

Credits

Created By FakeAcrade

Designed by Shannon King & Emily Wilkinson.

Music by, David Renda & Harry Rais.
